title: Remote Health Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to efficiently monitor my patients' health status in real-time so that I can provide timely interventions and maintain connection with socially isolated patients.

title: Personalized Data Privacy Controls – Granular Access Settings for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to have personalized data privacy controls that allow me to access my patients' health information while respecting their privacy preferences, so that I can efficiently monitor their health and maintain effective communication without compromising their autonomy.

title: Intuitive Data Interpretation Tools – Alerts for Significant Changes in Health Metrics
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive alerts for significant changes in my patients' health metrics so that I can monitor their health status efficiently and provide timely intervention.

title: Flexible Communication Options – Video Conferencing Capabilities for Virtual Check-Ins
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to use video conferencing capabilities to conduct virtual check-ins with my socially isolated patients so that I can maintain regular communication and provide emotional support between my visits.

title: Adaptive User Training Resources
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want access to adaptive training resources tailored to my experience level so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health and maintain effective communication without feeling overwhelmed by complex features.

title: Emergency Response Features - Instant Alerts for Caregivers During Emergencies
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive instant alerts during emergencies so that I can quickly respond to changes in my patients' health status and provide timely care.

title: Holistic Wellness Insights
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to access integrated physical and emotional health data for my patients so that I can provide more comprehensive care and support their overall well-being.
